dcterms:creator: L. Antiga
M. Piccinelli
L. Botti
B. Ene-Iordache
A. Remuzzi
D. A. Steinman
dcterms:description: A statistical shape model (SSM) built on real patient-specific aortas, used to generate synthetic aortic shapes for computational fluid dynamics simulations.
dcterms:title: Statistical Shape Model (SSM) of aortic shapes

dcterms:creator: J. L. Bruse
K. McLeod
G. Biglino
H. N. Ntsinjana
C. Capelli
T. Y. Hsia
dcterms:description: Cardiac and respiratory gated steady state free precession CMR images from patients previously diagnosed with coarctation of the aorta, used to develop the statistical shape model.
dcterms:title: Cardiac and respiratory gated steady state free precession CMR images

dcterms:creator: L. Liang
W. Mao
W. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 3,000 computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations performed on synthetically generated 3D aortic shapes derived from a statistical shape model.
dcterms:title: 3,000 CFD simulations on synthetically generated 3D aortic shapes

dcterms:creator: P. D. Morris
A. Narracott
H. Von Tengg-Kobligk
D. A. Soto
S. Hsiao
A. Lungu
dcterms:description: A dataset of real patient-specific aortas used to build a statistical shape model, consisting of 67 cases.
dcterms:title: Real patient-specific aortas (N=67)

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of ten patient cases with previously repaired coarctation of the aorta, used to validate the machine learning models.
dcterms:title: Ten patient cases with previously repaired coarctation of the aorta
